text:
Hi, I'm a tech recruiter for Rapid7. Below is a listing of our current openings in El Segundo, CA. If you're interested, you can reach me directly at samantha.oliver@rapid7.com.

All positions are ONSITE.

Product Manager (AppSpider) http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90764

Senior Product Manager http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90243

C++ Dev (AppSpider) http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90763

Senior Automation Engineer (Nexpose) http://www.rapid7.com/company/jobs.jsp?gh_jid=90888 We use Cucumber and Ruby.
